episodes.title: How to avoid getting drawn into a cult | BBC Ideas
episodes.description:
From self-help to religious groups, cults can take many forms – and the psychological techniques they use can make them hard to leave. Here's how to spot the warning signs...

Film by Daniel Nils Roberts. Made in partnership with  @TheOpenUniversity

Subscribe to BBC Ideas 👉 https://bbc.in/2F6ipav
____________________________

Do you have a curious mind? You’re in the right place.

Our aim on BBC Ideas is to feed your curiosity, to open your mind to new perspectives, and to leave you that little bit smarter.
